name: Skylight (itch)
description:
Skylight combines a simple platform jumping mechanic with a changing world and ever-changing audio.

You'll need to navigate increasingly sparse platforms and dimming light conditions. Levels are randomly generated, and a procedural soundtrack accompanies you, slowly building up as you travel, and different every time.

Can you make it all the way home?

http://www.nition.co/software

Note: Mouse sensitivity can be changed in-game with - or = on the keyboard, and inverted with i.
